# GET /v1/gameCenterAchievements/{id}/relationships/releases | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/gameCenterAchievements/{id}/relationships/releases ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterachievements-_id_-relationships-releases)

-  GET /v1/gameCenterAchievements/{id}/relationships/releases 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/gameCenterAchievements/{id}/relationships/releases

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterachievements-_id_-relationships-releases#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/gameCenterAchievements/{id}/relationships/releases
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterachievements-_id_-relationships-releases#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterachievements-_id_-relationships-releases#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200`## [Response Codes](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterachievements-_id_-relationships-releases#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[GameCenterAchievementReleasesLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/gamecenterachievementreleaseslinkagesresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterachievements-_id_-relationships-releases#see-also)

### [Managing Game Center achievement releases](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterachievements-_id_-relationships-releases#Managing-Game-Center-achievement-releases)

[`List achievement releases `](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterdetails-_id_-achievementreleases)Read information about the achievement releases for specific Game Center detail.[`GET /v1/gameCenterDetails/{id}/relationships/achievementReleases`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterdetails-_id_-relationships-achievementreleases)[`Read release information for an achievement`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterachievements-_id_-releases)Read the state of an achievement release and related information.[`Read Game Center achievement release information`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterachievementreleases-_id_)Read the state of a specific achievement release.[`Create a Game Center achievement release`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/post-v1-gamecenterachievementreleases)Create a release for an achievement and a Game Center detail.[`Delete a Game Center achievement release`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/delete-v1-gamecenterachievementreleases-_id_)Delete a release of an achievement or Game Center detail.
